'''Sensors''': *Passive: 10/0D *Scan: 25/1D *Search: 40/2D *Focus: 2/3D '''Capsule''': Built for tourists and business travelers, it was equipped with drinking and dining establishments, nightclubs, and casinos. A Ferryboat Liner could carry 500 passengers. They often hosted large banquets and parties. They were a common sight in civilian airspace.
